xs:element.name: SubReportInformationList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportInformation, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

ReportTitle.StrSql:
SELECT ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, SIX, SEVEN, EIGHT, OTHER, NVL(ONE,0)+ NVL(TWO,0)+ NVL(THREE,0)+NVL( FOUR,0)+NVL( FIVE,0)+NVL( SIX,0)+NVL( SEVEN,0)+NVL( EIGHT,0)+NVL( OTHER,0 ) HJ FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 120 THEN '小于10岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 240 THEN '10——20岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 360 THEN '20——30岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 480 THEN '30——40岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 600 THEN '40——50岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 720 THEN '50——60岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 840 THEN '60——70岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 960 THEN '70——80岁' ELSE '80岁以上' END AGE, COUNT(*) SL FROM v_operation_master_v2 a WHERE a.oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >= :STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) GROUP BY A.OPERATION_NAME , CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 120 THEN '小于10岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 240 THEN '10——20岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 360 THEN '20——30岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 480 THEN '30——40岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 600 THEN '40——50岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 720 THEN '50——60岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 840 THEN '60——70岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 960 THEN '70——80岁' ELSE '80岁以上' END
) PIVOT(SUM(SL) FOR AGE IN('小于10岁' ONE, '10——20岁' TWO, '20——30岁' THREE, '30——40岁' FOUR, '40——50岁' FIVE, '50——60岁' SIX, '60——70岁' SEVEN, '70——80岁' EIGHT, '80岁以上' OTHER))

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null)

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 120

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) > 120 and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 240

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) > 240 and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 360

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) > 360 and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 480

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME AND (a.operation_name like '%'||:VOPERATIONNAME||'%' or :VOPERATIONNAME is null) and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND (A.AnesMethod LIKE '%'||:VANESMETHOD||'%' or :VANESMETHOD is null) and (a.surgeon like '%'||:VDOCTOR||'%' or :VDOCTOR is null) and (a.anes_doctor like '%'||:VANESDOCTOR||'%' or :VANESDOCTOR is null) and (a.asa like '%'||:VASAGRADE||'%' or :VASAGRADE is null) and (a.OPERATION_SCALE like '%'||:VOPERSCALE||'%' or :VOPERSCALE is null) and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) > 840 and MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.ANES_START_TIME, A.DATE_OF_BIRTH) <= 960
